website_summaries.verdict: As one of the most revered brands in the world, it is not surprising that Polo Ralph Lauren has a reputation for making quality lifestyle sneakers, and the Polo Ralph Lauren Hanford is a testament to that. This low-top emanates a combination of style and class which works great on just about any occasion. With vivid colorways and a laid-back aesthetic that caters for all ages, the affordable Polo Ralph Lauren Hanford sneaker is worth copping.
pros: Several reported that the Polo Ralph Lauren Hanford could be used for work or casually
A few suggested that this low-top looks great when paired with shorts or jeans
It has ample comfort and fits well as per most buyers
Some said that this shoe is a great gift option for loved ones regardless of age
Many felt that the shoe is true to size
A couple of customers were delighted that the Polo Ralph Lauren Hanford looks more expensive than its price
cons: A user complained about the shoe being too hard on the foot dorsal or the upper surface of the foot
Some people said that the sneaker has less support in the arch
A few mentioned that the canvas gets dirty fast and is hard to clean

customer_reviews.title: Polo Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very comfortable, not to mention the quality of Ralph Lauren. I expect them to wear well with reasonable use and they are canvass so they should clean up nicely when needed. I would recommend these shoes if your looking for a spring / summer sneaker for casual outing's. They look great with shorts, jeans and khaki's.
customer_reviews.author: MarkManSTL

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely nice
customer_reviews.text: Snazzy shoes. And I do catch a lot of people looking down at them. If worn with a casual pair of slacks, looks classy indeed. These are vinyl or something like that and not canvas, which is alright by me.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, and Well worth $21.36
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes and they are completely worth the money. What a steal! If you go to your local shoe outlet you can pick up a pair of similar looking Van's for $50. Even though I love Van's, these shoes are half the price and just as amazing. The only thing I expected but was surprised about was how thin these shoes are. It's not paper-thin, but they are not as thick as Van's. They still have plenty of padding, but they are significantly slimmer. Shows up exactly as pictured above.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ries

customer_reviews.title: look nice but not for long....
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but have fun trying to clean these shoes if you buy them in white this materiel is very hard to keep clean and if you try and put them in the washer they just get all yellow and dingy looking.
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. I can walk around in these all day with no problems. I've had them for a few months now and for the most part they are still almost new. I only gave 4 stars due to the bottom rubber wearing around the heel which I've never seen on any shoe I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Mitcham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is so dirty doesn’t look like new at all so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pogikdm

customer_reviews.title: Polo fashion Sneackers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, fits as expected! Very comfy and stylish! Bought also the black with no laces, love them both, And for a steal price
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: Came with a stain
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1.Nice and classy looking 2. Fit well 3. Comfortable Cons: 1.A yellow stain was on the toe when I opened the box 2. Random colored thread on both of the shoes I like them a lot, but the fact that there's a stain on them?
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and good quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. This is not the rough canvas material but a rather smoother/finer cloth material. It looks good and feels good. Padding inside was good too. Size fits as expected, neither too big nor small.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, can't say more. I am planning to order another one, fits perfectly and very comfortable to wear.

customer_reviews.title: The price of the shoe was very good.
customer_reviews.text: My child coordinates these red sneakers with various outfits. The price of the shoe was very good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really do love how it fits you can go wrong with this purchase

customer_reviews.title: Larger that I was expecting

customer_reviews.title: I am 11. 5 and I feel I should ...

customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the shoe was long and fit really big. They were are reasonable price so I will get another pair for a lower price. The experience was good and the shipping was smooth and painless. Nice purchase experience.

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend was looking for nice, plain
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was looking for nice, plain, wear with everything sneakers and these are perfect! Love the brand and the look. He said they fit perfect and are very comfy! And they arrived very quickly .

product_meta.title: Polo Ralph Lauren Mens Hanford Rubber Hanford Rubber
product_meta.description: Add some sleek style to your wardrobe with the modern Polo by Ralph Lauren Hanford sneakers.
feature_bullets: Low-top sneaker with embroidered pony logo and racing stripe on midsole
